hash-algo.description: A selector for the hashing algorithm.

tcg-hash-algo-id.description: This is an index referencing the TCG Algorithm Registry based on tpm-alg-id.

hash.description: The hash value including hash-algo identifier.

hash-digest.description: A hash value based on a hash algorithm registered by an SDO.

hash-value.description: The binary representation of the hash value.

nonce.description: A nonce to show freshness and counter replays.

nonce-value.description:
This nonce SHOULD be generated via a registered
cryptographic-strength algorithm. In consequence,
the length of the nonce depends on the hash algorithm
used. The algorithm used in this case is independent
from the hash algorithm used to create the hash-value
in the response of the attestor.

tpm20-pcr-selection.description:
A Verifier can request one or more PCR values uses its individually created AC.
The corresponding selection filter is represented in this grouping. Requesting
a PCR value that is not in scope of the AC used, detailed exposure via error
msg should be avoided.

pcr-list.description:
For each PCR in this list an individual list of banks (hash-algo) can be
requested. It depends on the datastore, if every bank in this grouping is
included per PCR (crude), or if each requested bank set is returned for
each PCR individually (elegant).

items.description: The number of the PCR. At the moment this is limited 32.

tpm20-attestation-key-identifier.description: A selector for a suitable key identifier.

key-identifier.description: Identifier for the attestation key to use for signing attestation evidence.

public-key.description: The public key of tpm 2.0 attestation.

pub-key-id.description: The value of the identifier for the public key.

uuid.description: Use a YANG agent generated (and maintained) attestation key UUID.

uuid-value.description: The UUID identifying the corresponding public key.

tpm-identifier.description:
In a system with multiple-TPMs get the data from a specific TPM
identified by the name and physical-index.

tpm-name.description: Name value of a single TPM or 'All'.

compute-node-identifier.description: In a distributed system with multiple compute nodes, this is the node identified by name and physical-index.

node-physical-index.description: The entPhysicalIndex for the compute node.

node-location.description: Location of the compute node, such as slot number.

node-uptime.description: Uptime in seconds of the node.

up-time.description: Uptime in seconds of this node reporting its data.

log-identifier.description: Identifier for type of log to be retrieved.

log-type.description: The corresponding measurement log type identity.

boot-event-log.description: Defines an event log corresponding to the event that extended the PCR.

event-number.description: Unique event number of this event.

pcr-index.description: Defines the PCR index that this event extended.

items.description: The hash of the event data.
The event data size determined by event-size.

ima-event.description: Defines an hash log extend event for IMA measurements.

event-number.description: Unique number for this event for sequencing.

ima-template.description:
Name of the template used for event logs
for e.g. ima, ima-ng, ima-sig.

pcr-index.description: Defines the PCR index that this event extended.

bios-event-log.description: Measurement log created by the BIOS/UEFI.

bios-event-entry.description: Ordered list of TCG described event log that extended the PCRs in the order they were logged.

ima-event-entry.description: Ordered list of ima event logs by event-number.

event-logs.description: A selector for the log and its type.

log-type.description: Event log type determines the event logs content.

bios-event-logs.description:
This is an index referencing the TCG Algorithm
Registry based on TPM_ALG_ID.

ima-event-logs.description:
This is an index referencing the TCG Algorithm
Registry based on TPM_ALG_ID.

tpm-remote-attestation_schema.description: Root node of huawei remote attestation.

rats-support-structures.description:
Statistics of enabling verifiers or relying parties to discover the information necessary to use the
remote attestation RPCs appropriately.

items.description:
Statistics of tpm-alg-id values for the TPM in question.
Will include ComponentIndex soon.

compute-node.description: Statistics of hardware componnets in this composite device that RATS can be conducted with.

node-id.description: ID of the compute node, such as Board Serial Number.

tpms.description: List of TPMs in this composite device that RATS can be conducted with.

tpm.description: Statistics of in this composite device that RATS can be conducted with.

tpm-status.description: TPM chip self-test status, normal or abnormal.

certificates.description: List of TPM's certificates, including EK certificates and AK certificates.

certificate.description:
Statistics of can be accessed via this statement, including Initial Attestation
Key Cert, Local Attestation Key Cert or Endorsement Key Cert.

certificate-name.description: An arbitrary name for this identity certificate or certificate chain.

certificate-value.description:
The binary signed public endorsement key (EK), attestation key (AK) and corresponding claims
(EK, AK Certificate). In a TPM 2.0 the EK, AK Certificate resides in a well-defined NVRAM
location by the TPM vendor. Maybe certificate-value defined as binary type is a simple way.

ak-public-structure.description: Marshalled LAK public structure, used for LAK Certificate verification.
